verbose_text: Based on the current results and anticipating future climate change, we would also now suggest that plant breeders select future UK wheat cultivars for high grain yield, with no diminution of protein concentration in the grain, at high levels of nitrogen application (i.e. optimal values of 240-288 kg N ha -1) combined with (a) warmer temperatures in April (XREF_TABLE, XREF_FIG) and/or (b) drier conditions in June (XREF_TABLE, Supplementary Fig. 2).
